name: NIIT Institute of Information Technology

address: Sundarshan Munjal Marg, Minerva Ground Floor, Kalkaji

briefDescription: NIIT Foundation (NF), a not-for-profit organization setup by the promoters of NIIT, has the key objective of providing world-class education and training for the under-served communities. NF has a mandate to reach the unreached, uncared and unattended to ensure inclusive development in India. Our vision is to be global-path-breakers in employability training, gainfully employing at least 2 million under-served youth annually.To shape the mandate, NF has begun a number of programs that would positively impact the underprivileged of the country through various educational interventions. NF makes critical interventions towards upgrading the skill base and employability of marginalized youth - in urban slums and rural areas.
